entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 80S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 70S IN THE AFTERNOON
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS AROUND 80

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
